amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the Management of Lands and Resources account by $10,617,000 and increase the North American Wetlands Conservation Fund account by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the Management of Lands and Resources account by $10,617,000 and increase the North American Wetlands Conservation Fund account by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Richmond amendment (A006) Failed by voice vote.
